Interface TopicsTree

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultTopicsTree

    public interface TopicsTree
    Author:
    Mário Júnior

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      TreeNode firstTopic() 
      TreeNode getRootNode()
      Gets the root TreeNode of the current TopicsTree.
      TopicsTree subTree(java.lang.String path)
      Creates a sub-tree of the tree from a specific node level

    • Method Detail

      • subTree

        TopicsTree subTree(java.lang.String path)
        Creates a sub-tree of the tree from a specific node level
        Parameters:
        path - the node level/path from which the sub-tree must be created. A valid path has a minimum of one forward slash. Example: getting-started/examples
        Returns:
        the sub TopicsTree if the node path can be matched, otherwise null is returned.

      • getRootNode

        TreeNode getRootNode()
        Gets the root TreeNode of the current TopicsTree.
        Returns:
        the TreeNode instance that represents the current of the currrent TopicsTree.

        TreeNode firstTopic()
